hero.title: Test assignment for front-end developer
hero.text: What defines a good front-end developer is one that has skilled knowledge of HTML, CSS, JS with a vast understanding of User design thinking as they'll be building web interfaces with accessibility in mind. They should also be excited to learn, as the world of Front-End Development keeps evolving.

error.invalid-email: email must be a valid email
error.invalid-photo: image must be in jpg/jpeg format, with a minimum resolution of 70x70px, and a file size not exceeding 5MB.
error.min-length-name: name must be at least 2 characters
error.max-length-name: name must be at most 60 characters
